item.title: C-Wars?....Reward
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

Well, I went searching for it in my client.java I’m not sure if it’s full but here is the points and such.

public void cw() { //
if (absX <= 2370 && absX >= 3273 && absY <= 3072 && absY >= 3135) { // cwars
int miHP = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
if ((miHP <= 20) && (playerissara == 1)) {
miHP += 100;
teleportToX = 2426;
teleportToY = 3074;
heightLevel = 1;
playerissara = 1;
sendMessage("You are teleported back to the spawn room.");
}
else if ((miHP <= 20) && (playeriszammy == 1)) {
miHP += 100;
teleportToX = 2370;
teleportToY = 3131;
heightLevel = 1;
playeriszammy = 1;
sendMessage("You died.");
}
if ((zammypoint == 5) && (playeriszammy == 1)) {
addItem(995, 5000000);
sendMessage("You have won the battle.");
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3093;
heightLevel = 0;
playeriszammy = 0;
playerissara = 0;
zammypoint = 0;
sarapoint = 0;
zammorakban = 0;
saradominban = 0;
startcw = 0;
}
else if ((zammypoint == 5) && (playerissara == 1)) {
sendMessage("You have lost the battle...");
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3093;
heightLevel = 0;
playeriszammy = 0;
playerissara = 0;
zammypoint = 0;
sarapoint = 0;
zammorakban = 0;
saradominban = 0;
startcw = 0;
}
if ((sarapoint == 5) && (playerissara == 1)) {
addItem(995, 5000000);
sendMessage("You have won the battle.");
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3093;
heightLevel = 0;
playeriszammy = 0;
playerissara = 0;
zammypoint = 0;
sarapoint = 0;
zammorakban = 0;
saradominban = 0;
startcw = 0;
}
if ((sarapoint == 5) && (playeriszammy == 1)) {
sendMessage("You have lost the battle..");
teleportToX = 2440;
teleportToY = 3093;
heightLevel = 0;
playeriszammy = 0;
playerissara = 0;
zammypoint = 0;
sarapoint = 0;
zammorakban = 0;
saradominban = 0;
startcw = 0;
}
}
}

Just add that in your voids…
